Name: Fluff-Fleece Goat
Desc: These gentle beasts can be found all over Teyvat and were among the earliest livestock tamed by humans.\nFluff-Fleece Goat, as their name indicates, have soft and warm fur that is used to weave clothing. Humans also love them for their delicious milk. In the distant past, these beasts, often called "Soft-Furs," played an important role in the ceremonial affairs of the region's ancestral people, but that's a story for another time.
